The Respondent is a limited liability company incorporated in Sri Lanka engaged in importing,
manufacturing and distribution of dairy products. The largest shareholder of the Respondent is
Fonterra Brands (Asia holdings) Pvt. Ltd. which is in turn a wholly owned subsidiary of Fonterra
Co-operative Group Ltd. of New Zealand.
The Respondent entered into a licensee agreement with the New Zealand Milk Brands Ltd. for
ten  years  with  effect

the  manufacture,  packaging,  marketing,  distribution  and  sale  of  products  in  Sri  Lanka.  The
Agreement also provided for the payment of royalty.
